text_block_list.text:
One day, in the middle of the Summer Training Camp. 
After the training for the day went well—

text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute
text_block_list.text: Trainer, are you free after this?

text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute
text_block_list.text:
There's this darling of a place I want to go to. 
If it's alright with you, would you like to go?
choice_data_list: Of course it's alright with me.

text_block_list.text:
It was rare for Wonder Acute to invite me somewhere. 
I wonder where she wanted to go so badly?
When I was standing at the bus stop in front of the boarding house with Wonder Acute, a lot of umamusumes in yukatas started crossing the road right in front of us.

text_block_list.name: Yukata Umamusumes
text_block_list.text: What are we doing when we get there? I want to eat takoyaki… ah I want to go to the shooting gallery! After going around the festival, let's stake out a good spot for the fireworks! I'm so looking forward to them～!

text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute
text_block_list.text:
Oh deary, it seems that there's a festival going on nearby. 
As well as a fireworks show.
choice_data_list: Huh, we weren't going to the festival?
Huh, we weren't going to the festival?

text_block_list.text: (Vrrrrrr)

text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute
text_block_list.text: Fufu, we're going that way, on this bus.

text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute
text_block_list.text:
Phew, we've arrived. 
The reception desk is… ah, over there.
Following her gaze, there were people drawing and writing messages on washi paper, and they were formed into square shapes with thin strips of bamboo. This was—
choice_data_list: Floating lanterns? How nice, very elegant.

text_block_list.text: Fufu, I'm pleased… It seems like your type of event, so I was wondering if you'd still enjoy yourself if we went together.
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: Now then, let's go write our little wishes, shall we～
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text:
Ah, I wonder if it's better to keep it a secret. 
If we do that, our wishes will come true, right?
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: With a brush in hand, I thought about what I wanted to wish for— All the time I've spent with Wonder Acute came to my mind naturally.
The moment where I almost quit being a trainer, the moment I met Wonder Acute.
She's encouraged me many times over, every time it warmed my heart. Encouraged by her earnest and tenacious personality.
That's why when I officially became her trainer, from the bottom of my heart, I was ecstatic. And so, with her, I'd—
I've written down my honest feelings onto the floating lantern. And then—

text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute
text_block_list.text: … Oh my, the fireflies have come out. This area seems to be flowing slowly. Trainer, let's head over there.
In the darkness of the night, we could see a lot of floating lanterns swaying gently along the surface of the water.

text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute
text_block_list.text:
Well then, time to let them float. 
And… Here. We. Go.
The two lanterns we had glowed softly and gently drifted off towards the other lanterns.
We weren't able to tell which ones were ours once they joined the pack. Together with Wonder Acute, we were staring intently into the water.
After the floating lantern event ended, I was walking leisurely with Wonder Acute towards the bus stop.

text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute
text_block_list.text:
… There isn't a soul in sight. 
The night's so quiet, isn't it. Also—
( Krrrt… Krrrt… Krrrt…)

text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute
text_block_list.text: … They're still…
choice_data_list: The chirps of the bugs sound beautiful.
The chirps of the bugs sound beautiful.

text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute
text_block_list.text:
Right you are, deary. 
… It's almost time, isn't it.

text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute
text_block_list.text: Hey. I really—

At this point, the conversation halted. 
Suddenly, I became thirsty—

text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute
text_block_list.text: Here you go, Trainer, some water.
Once again, while listening to the sounds of insects, I enjoyed this moment. This was a good feeling, natural, as if it could last—

text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute
text_block_list.text: … It's a mysterious feeling, isn't it.

text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute
text_block_list.text: Well… don't laugh at this, but, being here, it just feels—
… feels like we're revisiting the past, like we've been together forever.
choice_data_list: I was thinking the same thing.
I was thinking the same thing.
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute
Wonder Acute
text_block_list.text: … Oh deary.

text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute
text_block_list.text: … Fufu, look at us, thinking the exact same thing like we're on the same wavelength! It's a slightly weird feeling, but—
choice_data_list: It's normal to feel like this.
It's normal to feel like this.

text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute
text_block_list.text: Fufufu, it really is, isn't it… Also—

text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute
text_block_list.text: ( I feel like I get it now. This fateful encounter… it really is…)

Fufu… 
It might've not been necessary to write that then.
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute
Wonder Acute
text_block_list.text:
Now now, let's head back. 
Let's take… our sweet time walking back together, side by side.
That night—

Whoa, they're floating! They're so pretty— 
… Heh heh… hey look at them! Those 2 over there!
text_block_list.name: Girlfriend

text_block_list.text:
"I want to keep running, together with her." 
"I want this fateful encounter to last forever, together with Trainer"
text_block_list.name: Boyfriend
Girlfriend
text_block_list.text:
Heh heh… They wished for the same thing. 
Maybe, these wishes have already come true.
